item.title: HTMX + Flask: Modern Python Web Apps, Hold the JavaScript
item.description:
Description

See how to combine htmx for building dynamic, interactive web apps in 100% Flask and Python without the need for frontend frameworks like Vue.js and others.
item.dc:creator: Michael Kennedy

item.title: Rapid development with Flask, TailwindCSS, HTMX and AlpineJS
item.description:
Description

In this workshop, Rapid Development with Flask, HTMX, TailwindCSS, and AlpineJS, Jose will show you how to build engaging, interactive websites and web applications quickly. This style of development is great for finding product-market fit, building internal tools, and working on personal projects.
item.dc:creator: Jose Salvatierra
